name: Wild Horse Racing Champions
description:
Wild Horse Racing Champions: Derby Action is the 3D most realistic top horse racing simulation game for your device. Challenge and race against other horses and become the horse champion of the race. Now saddle up on your horse and start to test your horse riding skills.
Horse Derby game brings the experiences of a real horse in a challenging 3D environment in which you ride a horse on the given track and cross obstacles and hurdles. You will face exciting tournaments all around the world to prove your talent and skills.
Play this horse jumping game for free and show your horse racing skills to get the title of the world horse champion. Practice with your horse to compete in a series of challenging competitions.
In this horse racing game, there are two modes. First in which you can train your horse so it can run in the race championship and can beat other horses and second is in which you have to race through tracks dodge and pass all the hurdles and difficulties and compete against the best rider in the world. You have to face all kinds of obstacles to win.
The goal is to be first at the finish line without suffering any kind of incident in this wild horse game for free!
Wild Horse Racing Champions: Derby Action game is designed for especially those who want to improve their horse riding skills.
The gameplay starts as an endless runner .You are provided with smooth and easy to use controls which help you to become the world no 1 horse racer in this horse riding game. Take your mustang to the challenge and make your horse jump over fence and other obstacles during fierce competitions. Pass the finishing line first and earn more and more coins to upgrade your horses in this horse jumping game to win all the races and become the world champion!
The main task in horse games for free is to be first at the finish line by passing all the hurdles in your way to clear game challenge and to win the respect of the stable! Be the champion jockey of this horse derby racer game.

Choose your favorite stallion from the main menu. Start race avoid any contact with hurdles by jumping horse and reach first at the finishing line. You have to avoid obstacles in the game. Once you pass the finishing line your level will be completed and you are directed to the next level .Compete against you competitors and beat them in this race challenge with in the given time.

Game Features:
¬ HD graphics
¬ Realistic animations
¬ Smooth controls
¬ Immersive environment
¬ Exciting challenges
Download Wild Horse Racing Champions: Derby Action game now and train yourself to compete against your rivals become the best horse racer in the world!
